website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for aspiring gardeners – ideal for teaching kids how to cultivate and nurture plants while stimulating their creative side.
pros: A unique kit for crafting with plants that includes everything kids need to start and decorate an indoor potted garden, including potting soil mix, paint, and decorative items
cons: Some consumers received kits with damaged/broken potting dishes
More variety in the included seeds would be nice – includes mostly grasses and beans

customer_reviews.title: The figurines diny stand up straight and I don’t feel like there was enough soil to plant the seeds below ...
customer_reviews.text: This stinks! My daughter painted the bowl and accessories and we followed the directions to a T when it came to planting. The figurines diny stand up straight and I don’t feel like there was enough soil to plant the seeds below the surface. It’s basically just grass and it stinks!! We have to keep it outside because the smell is so bad. The bowl looks cheap and it’s overpriced. 2 stars because my daughter liked it, but really on,y worth 1 star in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jbuechler

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but smells bad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 5 year old daughter. She had a blast painting everything and planting the seeds. Surprisingly, in just a few days the seeds had already started to sprout. However, after a few more days we started noticing a foul odor in the room (smelled like dirty laundry). The smell was strong enough to permeate my daughter's room. We quickly determined that the smell was emanating from the garden. I have no idea what is causing the smell but we had to move the garden to a larger room where the smell is less noticeable. If the smell continues we'll need to throw the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: ansky

customer_reviews.title: not a single seed sprouted
customer_reviews.text: the kids enjoyed putting it together...although the materials we so cheap i would have saved a lot of money just going to the dollar store to get this stuff myself. The pot wasn't deep enough nor have enough soil to cover the seeds and the ones that were able to be covered didn't sprout.....now i have a green thumb, they had adequate lighting and water.....it was a real waste of money for $25....go buy a small bag of soil for $2, a play dinosaur and gems for $4 and a fake candle light for $1....you basically have the same damn thing.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not enough soil
customer_reviews.text: I received this as part of a STEM subscription. The boys were super excited to paint the volcano and dinosaur eggs. However, the glow in the dark paint was so thick and the eggs so tiny that there was no way a kid could paint them. It was hard for me to paint them! I followed all of the directions for planting the seeds including soaking them for 30 minutes. The grass sprouted in a few days but it seems there either isn’t enough soil or the tray is too shallow. The roots are so strong that the seeds are no longer covered in soil. I’m thinking of starting over with my own potting soil. Kids are super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: blascanio

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old had a lot of fun with this. The instructions were clear and simple. The kit includes enough seeds for a few plantings. The wheat grass grew within a day with the chia seeds growing after about 3. We didn’t plant many beans but they sprouted after about 4. This would be a great gift for an inquisitive child. My only complaint is the volcano did not stay taped together, but that didn’t seem to bother my son.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Experiment disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons were very excited to build their own dinosaur habitat and we put it together. The dirt is very loose, so it required a tray underneath to contain it. The seed started sprouting quickly, but they never grew any bigger than a sprout. Turning the light on under the volcano required the "volcano" to be lifted, the light picked up and turned on and then everything reassembled. The light was also already burned out. The flourescent paint did not glow after it was dry. Great idea if it had worked.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne list

customer_reviews.title: Fun B'day gift
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year old loved putting this dino habitat together. It required a little assistance to setup, but he loved deciding where ecerything went! It took about 3 days for seeds to start sprouting about a week later they are going good! He loves having the responsibility to water daily - and with the spray bottle provided, he really can't overdo it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old got this from the Easter Bunny and loves it. The plants grow amazingly fast! We saw sprouts in just a couple days, and the bean plants grow so quickly you can see a difference in height between the morning and that same night. Very easy to care for. We don’t have a sunny spot to keep it in, so we let it sit outside in the sun for a few hours every couple days, and it does well.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Gift for granddaughter if she's happy I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: As far as value-for-money I can only say it was given as a gift for surprisingly my granddaughters Birthday. It's what she told Grandma and Grandpa she wanted so that's what you got besides Barbies and other things. I guess I shouldn't be surprised they are very crafty granddaughters because of their mom is very crafty.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it, but maybe not quite worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a part of our Amazon STEM subscription. My son is super excited about it, but I’m not really convinced it’s worth the price. I wish an info booklet about dinosaurs, at the very least, would be included—info about growing plants would have been great too. As someone mentioned, there’s no drainage in the bowl, but holes are easily drilled on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: SkellngtonPrncess

customer_reviews.title: Really cute but missing the paint/paintbrush
customer_reviews.text: So I have purchased two of these kits for my girls. One came completely intact, the other is missing the paint and paintbrush. Without the paint, this kit became a HUGE disappointment. My one daughter opted to share with the other but I don't think there will be enough paint to complete both projects. :/
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Bay

customer_reviews.title: Building a child's creative miind
customer_reviews.text: We decided to make this a "Stem" Christmas...toys related to Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics...and this was a hit with our 7 & 4 year old grandsons. It was 1 of 5 related toys they received....and it was evidently a great idea judging by their reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn In Houston, TXTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for dinosaur lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a birthday gift and I recently purchased for one of my sons friends as a birthday gift. My son and I loved putting this together and watching the plants grow. My son is 6 and did require my help putting it together so it’s a good activity for parents and children to work on together. It’s also the perfect gift for little dinosaur lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D Holleran Laping

customer_reviews.title: Cute to build. Just doesn’t grow much of anything.
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun building this set and creating the volcano and the scene for our seeds to grow. Unfortunately tho u don’t feel there is enough “ dirt” for anything to actually grow very well. The chia cake up n died instantly and the wheat germ sprouted. But the other beans never showed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Natale

customer_reviews.title: Fun and educational
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun to do. My son is 5 and really enjoyed it. We did it for about 2 months total. We saved everything so we can always do it again. He learned to be patient, kind of. About photosynthesis. And while glue was drying we watched specials on dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Steff R

customer_reviews.title: A fun gift for a 4-year old girl. But could be any age.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for our neighbor's daughter. She is 4 and loved it. This kept her busy and it let mom and daughter have some fun creative time painting, putting the garden together and having the fairy watch over the garden. They watched it grow day by day. And it grew fast. I would recommend it as a gift for many ages because you could do it with or without a parent overseeing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool project for my granddaughter ......
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this little garden for my granddaughter’s birthday. Her and her brother got together and painted it and put the dirt in, colored the decorations and planted the seeds, they had such a great time doing it. The growth in this picture is six days worth of growth after we planted the seeds on Friday this is what it looks like today Wednesday. Such a clever little project for kids. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover23

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My bff’s daughter just loved this! Great project for kids. She received it for Christmas and has continued to use it and plant new things, which she proudly shows me when I visit
customer_reviews.author: Lilskibum

customer_reviews.title: The fairy looked nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't very impressed. The fairy looked nothing like the picture, very cheaply made. There wasn't enough soil either, I added some of my own. However, my daughter did have fun putting it together and watching the plants grow.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: Great project
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mommy and me project for my daughter and I. She loves seeing the seeds grow but so far it’s only been the grass and not the other seeds They probably won’t grow and she’ll be slightly disappointed but such is life in general a great project and she was still Very excited for the growth
customer_reviews.author: Melis

customer_reviews.title: Quick payoff!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 & 5 year old loved the dinosaur garden. The plants have already started sprouting 2 days later. It's a fun set with a quick payoff for short attention spands! They loved painting the volcano and dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grow so fast !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old niece because she loves doing little projects . She had fun painting and setting it up. I wasn’t sure how well it was going to grow , but It was just something to keep her busy . Let me tell you this thing started growing so fast ! She was so excited . Definitely a cool gift for kids who like doing projects .
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE

customer_reviews.title: Quick growing!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! Easy and fun to prepare with pretty results. Grows like CRAZY!! In the picture, it's about a month old.
customer_reviews.author: S. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great activity for kids!
customer_reviews.text: About a week and a half in and this is what it looks like. Awesome science craft for kids. Especially if you go the long run and teach the children about the life cycle of plants and how they contribute after they die.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I loved doing this fairy garden together! We are on or second round of seeds now, and both times (one time using sand in kit, the second time using rocks for fish tank) the seeds sprouted with ease! My daughter loves seeing how much it grows over night. I am beyond happy with my purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lovelifexo

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids loved planting and arranging this dino habitat. The seeds grew quickly and well. Even had a bunch left over to plant in pots, which my kids thought was neat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Ganddaughter's 9nth birthday. She loves gardening and she is very artistic. She had great fun painting all the items. They were beautiful when she was done. She then planted the seeds, which sprouted quickly. It was not long before she trimmed the grass and transplanted the bean into a pot because it was so big. The quality of the pot is not the best, if you are thinking in adult terms; but for a youngster, the important thing is the fun they will have using it.It is certainly sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Zubricky

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift- love the creativity it inspires
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old really loved this.. we had enough seeds to make the garden twice. It was fun for her to get creative with the painting and design of the garden. Have gifted it as well.
customer_reviews.author: goldenugget

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this product is unacceptable! Cheaply made and the contents, which were to start a fairy garden; extremely disappointing. I bought two of these to bring to granddaughters and unable to return because they were opened. The paints had leaked and were unusable. The girls were only able to salvage a couple pieces out of these kits so would not recommend this at all
customer_reviews.author: gwen k mccarty-haase

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It’s really growing fast! 🌱✨
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! My daughter had so much fun to painting them (We used some other acrylic paint too)and 4days after plant the seeds in It started growing so fast day by day, my daughter is so excited to check how they are growing every morning. We are wondering how it gets tall, so we plant left over seeds in another pot, and now after 2 months it grows over 6 feet and we see the BEENS 😳❤️ We had so much fun with this project!!✨
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: No drainage, cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tray is underwhelming and promotes mold because there's no inner tray to help with drainage. My daughter has been really sad about this overall. The fairies are so cheap looking, but she likes the ceramic bits so I'm giving it 2 stars. She loved painting them and they look cute. The seeds did sprout but we world have been better off getting our own things separately.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Burns

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter got this from the Easter bunny and she enjoyed it so much. She loves the thought that the tooth fairy might decide to spend the night there when she finally loses her first tooth! She put extra effort into making it absolutely perfect and had a wonderful time doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Magical fairy garden grows like crazy
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to put together, fun to go out and water and watch every day, and just absolutely adorable. Our granddaughter adored this gift. She and Papa have fun putting it together and watching it grow. The seeds took very quickly and within a few days her fairy garden was pretty magical.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old received this as a Christmas gift and she absolutely loved it. She's so excited to water the seeds every morning and she loved making the garden all her own. I can't wait to see it all filled in. I would definitely recommend this and I will keep it in mind as a gift to give in the future.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: Fairy Garden
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy for my daughter's 6th birthday. I was very surprised by the quality given the low price. We did have to add some of our own garden soil otherwise the soil would be quite low. My daughter was able to paint the ceramic pieces by herself and the container the plants are grown in. The plants were already growing by the day after she planted the seeds. The plants still look great over a month later. She has played with the garden and it makes a nice centerpiece on the table. Well worth the price, easy to use, and fun to decorate.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fun and educational
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my 7 year old granddaughter as a project we could do together. It was Amazing to create and watch grow. Loved it so much bought for my 4 year old neighbor as a birthday gift. She loved hers as well!
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: She has absolutely enjoyed this gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my 5 y.o. daughter. She has absolutely enjoyed this gift. We followed instructions and used only about 1/2 of the seeds to start without adding any extra dirt as others have mentioned. Her plants are thriving and she loved being able to create her own designs and paint the items the way that she wanted. My one complaint is that the paint will rub off of the plastic container if it gets wet again, but it isn't that big of a deal to me. The paint has not come off of the house or the toadstools in the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute crafty gift
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo niece loved this make your own fairy garden! It included a couple different types of craft projects all in one! The end result is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Enchanting!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter absolutely loves this! I bought it for her for Christmas and she has thoroughly enjoyed it. Her plants are now about 10" tall (would do better with more light) and she is delighted. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denice Hicks

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was telling my mom how good she was this year because Santa brought her one ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit for Christmas! On the front of the box, it had a "best toy award" sticker . My daughter was telling my mom how good she was this year because Santa brought her one of his best toys! :) this is something fun to do inside and he creative. We had fun painting all the pieces and putting it together. We have a few sprouts and plenty of seeds left to plant at some point
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful child's gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a masterful gift that months later is still bringing great joy and intrigue. It is so pleasing to the senses to see the plants growing, but DO ADD more potting mix as the material inside the box is not enough. Just remember to keep it lightly watered every other day if outside, or once a week inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 7 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 7 year old niece and she loved it. My sister said she had one a couple years earlier and didn't quite get into it but this time she seemed the perfect age for the product. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Trh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for young children!
customer_reviews.text: This fairy garden is our go-to gift for any children between the ages of 5-9. Amazing for little girls, but I think many little boys also enjoy this gift (maybe not 7-9, but younger YES!) It's so cute, they can paint and arrange the figurines and the garden begins to sprout within two days.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fairy Garden
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They continue to grow rapidly daily since planting them 9 days ago. My girls are 4 & 6 and enjoyed doing it and wake up excited to see the growth progress! Definitely worth the money. I have it inside with minimal light exposure and they are flourishing. Water daily and bam here you have a awesome little garden. They have water spots on the tips with q gel like consistency that makes them look real pretty and shiny.😊
customer_reviews.author: Monica Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Great quality! Lots of fun! Plenty of supplies included. Like I said, great quality peices and supplies. Paint, paint brushes, glitter, jewels, dirt, 2 different bags of seeds/beans, planter, fairy house, 2 toadstools, flowers, and i think that is about it. My girls had a blast. Box says age 7-97, my girls are 12, almost 4 and almost 2.
customer_reviews.author: jmorthiel

customer_reviews.title: My daughter absolutely LOVED this fairy garden
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVED this fairy garden. It grows really fast and she was so excited to put it all together and see it sprouting by the next morning. And she swore her fairy "moved" to different places ;)
customer_reviews.author: A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old has loved this project
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has loved this project. It is nice because it is not a one use thing. She would water it every day with a spray bottle. The stuff is starting to die off but honestly we might have forgotten to water it a few days. We will most likely grow another round because they give you more than enough seeds.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Super fun project!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my youngest daughter. She was not quite 4 when we did it and she LOVE LOVE LOVED it!! She had so much fun painting and decorating. We were so surprised at how quickly the plants grew (and grew and GREW!) We did have to add some extra potting soil as the amount that came with it wouldn't have been enough. Also, the paint choices were somewhat limited, but she never even noticed that- she was more than happy with the color choices. I would CERTAINLY buy this again for a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my friend's 5 year old daughter's birthday! She loved it and it was even fun for me to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We got an insect in our box!
customer_reviews.text: Over priced fairy garden. The parts are all cheaply made and we got a dead bug in with our "jewels". Not what your little girl wants to find when making a fairy garden. Look at Michaels or Christmas tree shops for nicer options.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea - my son had a good time putting it together and watching it sprout. Then the whole thing grew moldy
customer_reviews.author: roadfamily6now

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing thing I have ever bought! The grass grows so quickly! Like less than 3 days after planting! My toddlers water it and watch it every day!! We are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for an 8 year old and she loved it! This may be my go-to gift from now on: it’s not just any old toy you can get in a chain store, and parents love that it’s somwthing creative for their kids to do.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilcot

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really good gift for a 5 year old. She loves to water it everyday and watch it grow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought a gift that multiple parents asked me where I got it, including the receiver. It’s perfect for girls in the 4-7 range I think!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter is 10 and she loved it for her birthday. Paint is low quality but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarbear

customer_reviews.title: product was just "ok"
customer_reviews.text: Fairy Garden kit was fun for my 7 year old daughter. It kept her busy for a while painting it. Watching the garden grow was fun to... I don't think the price is worth it though. There is also not enough dirt included with the kit, I think the container you put it in is too shallow. All of the roots are coming above the soil. We got this for Christmas and she has lost interest in it after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Bns

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, and the grass grows
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old daughter got this as a gift in September 2012. It is a great craft activity because there are a few different elements to it: painting, arranging and planting. She enjoyed painting everything, planting the seeds and arranging the figures. The grass grows kind of fast, so while it's not total immediate gratification, it is only about a week or so before you see green sprouting. However, I have a black thumb and our grass is looking sad lately! It is well-priced and we recently gave it as a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a blast making it (me and my 4.5 yr old) and the thing grew so much and so big!!! It got moldy after a few months but there was enough stuff to grow it a second time so we just cleaned the container. Highly recommend for ages 2-8!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creative, educational and fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute setup. I ordered a different one from a different company and it didn't come as a complete craft kit like this one did. My niece was really excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun kit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5) loved this kit. Being able to design the planter tray and ceramic decorations was a lot fun. The best part was watching the plants grow. I take away a star because there isn't enough soil to really cover the seeds well and the fairy is cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: My niece likes this kit because it’s so much to do with it. You have to paint everything and plant the seeds and then take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good kid project
customer_reviews.text: Great for a rainy day project. The 5 year old was able to paint the figures by herself. A little messy because you need to touch the pieces to get to the other side but that's expected. The plants grow like crazy. We needed to trim them from time to time. Once the plants died, we put the figures in our outside garden where they still look just like they did fro the start. The paint hasn't washed off.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: A must have for fairy lovers and great bonding activity
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit. My daughter and Grandma did it together as a bonding activity. They had a lot of fun together painting the items, planting the seeds and staging the garden. It gets checked daily for fairy activity. We've also had a lot of fun tracking the growth of the plants. My daughter likes to get out her scissors and "trim" the grass. Its been a couple weeks and still is a daily interest.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! You will love it ❤
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT!!! You will not regret it!! I think I loved it more than my grand baby.lol. This is my first time taking care of A plant and it actually stay alive. I give it spring water only no tap and its still growing 🙌🏾 🌱
customer_reviews.author: Hisangel32

customer_reviews.title: Educational and dummy proof garden.
customer_reviews.text: The seeds grew so well. It was fun to put together and great educational project for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Buscemi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Not enough seeds to grow anything
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Not enough seeds to grow anything. A few sprouts of grass and beans that didn't grow as well. Just terrible, do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: CR46941

customer_reviews.title: It's actually grew
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this and it was easy to get set up and watch it grow. Which it did way more than I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Hallford

customer_reviews.title: Great activity/gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a Christmas exchange, & the little girl was super excited. It’s a cute project to do with your kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Really cute idea, horrible paint
customer_reviews.text: This was such a fun birthday present for my daughters 9th birthday. However, the paint doesn't stick to the items you're suppose to paint. It's almost as if the paint is too watery. We ended up using acrylic paint we already had.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So simple my 6 year old did it by herself.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved putting this together!(she is 6). She did it all by herself. And looks just like the picture on the box.
customer_reviews.author: lorenda

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for her to put together with her Grammie and they enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift!! We received one for my 5 year old and she loved it, so we got one for her friend and she loved it as well. Decorate with an adult and then water it and watch it grow. Great craft!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Y

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This product was missing pieces including the seeds. My granddaughter was very disappointed, and I would not recommend this to anyone wanting to please a child.
customer_reviews.author: p duke

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: I personally think this is a great idea, especially if space is an issue, but you still want a fairy garden. I love that it comes with everything, and you start from scratch by painting, and planting, and caring for your garden, and then adding the fairy, and her things. You can add things to the garden if you want, but it is so cute as it is. Fun to start, and keep going.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nieces loved this and they loved watching it grow and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nieces loved this and they loved watching it grow and it did grow (like a jungle). It didn't last too long. The main thing was that they learned a bit about gardening, nature and patience while also being creative.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of the product but the plants ended up dying because they became root bound. I had a very upset daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Purple

customer_reviews.title: Great project for my four-year-old daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved building this and she got very creative with the painting The Grass grew like a forest and was fun to watch great project that keeps them away from TV and phone
customer_reviews.author: Mike Begnoche

customer_reviews.title: decent activity to do...did with me 6 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: decent little activity I did with my 6 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Jennene W.

customer_reviews.title: Cool environment
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved making this and watching the sprouts grow. Do not set outside in direct sunlight for more than a few hours. Will kill the sprouts.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and lots to do . Fun for girls . It's nice because everything in this kit is very well thought out
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for your children. Adding the different layers, taking ownership in the design of the jar and care of the seeds, allows for a sense of ownership and pride as the seeds begin to sprout. One of the best products that we've ever purchased for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: jay gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little gardeners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 7th birthday, and she absolutely loves it. All of the pieces came securely wrapped and intact, the seeds sprouted within a couple days like they were supposed to, the paints adhered well, etc. No complaints at all about this product for a kid's garden!
customer_reviews.author: crazymama

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun to do with your child. I got her this while I was gardening outdoors so she could have one indoors. She loved creating the whole thing (with my help). I would catch her playing with the fairy in the little garden :). Be carful not to water it to much because it doesn't drain. Maybe you'll want to stab holes in the bottom so it can drain properly? The soil is real neat soil. We added some of our own soil too. I would recommend to anyone with a girl who loves fairies or even likes the idea of the Toothfairy ;)
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fairy Garden
customer_reviews.text: She had so much fun painting the kit items and planting the seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old after she asked Santa for a Fairy Garden. We loved putting it together, painting, planting and so forth. We still have it almost a year later. Yes, you do need a little extra soil and yes, I did go to Home Depot and bought a couple of small dwarf plants after the grass got out of control and started looking crazy. The point is we still have it sitting in our window seal and we look at it daily. Love it!!! This Spring we intend on taking the mushroon, fairy, and all the wonderful accesories and planting them in a larger fairy garden outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fairy lovers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved getting this for her 8th birthday. She immediately set to work painting the pot, and had so much fun painting all the little pieces, planting the seeds, and watching it all grow. This is a perfect gift for the fairy-loving girl in your life. Quality is good, and instructions are easy to follow... for the adults who want to. Of course the kids just start in on it, which is the way it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This package came with everything you need for your little gardener and artist. We had a lot of fun putting it together and watching the growth by the day -AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Tasia

customer_reviews.title: Needs more dirt
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 7 year old daughter and she wanted to get it out right away! I noticed the white planter was cracked, so we sent it back & they sent us a new one right away! My daughter loved painting everything. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is that there is not enough dirt provided to cover the seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great project for littles!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift! I bought this as a craft project to do with my 4 year old granddaughter. She loved it! She had so much fun painting designing and planting it all herself. And the fun continued each week that she cane over and watered and watched it grow.
customer_reviews.author: Coree Middleton

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this. It was a fun project putting together ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. It was a fun project putting together and the quick results were SO exciting. I definitely recommend this. I wish it came with a little more dirt as you are able to plant new seeds over and over. If you are going to keep up with it, buy some extra potting soil and it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Beejerooni

customer_reviews.title: Great Project for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love these. Gave one less star because you need to add more dirt they don't give you enough - but easy to fix. The grass grows in just a few days. And grows, and grows!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gives this to all her friends for bdays. It is an awesome gift for girls ages 5-10.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Made

customer_reviews.title: did not grow
customer_reviews.text: I thought this looked so cute. the little girl we bought it for painted the little house.....got everything ready, and the garden never grew. not even a little sprout. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute idea, lacks thought
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoyed this, but mainly because of fancy writing on the box. You would be much better off though going to a craft and garden store. The paint did not hold well, jewels dont match the theme, and most the seeds never sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Enchanted Fairy Garden
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loved painting the container and the mushrooms and fairy house. We planted the grass and beans and had to wait almost 2 weeks before it grew but once it stared, it NEVER stopped!! She takes care of her garden every day and shows all of her friends. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was the wait time to grow but other than that it was worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: bellasmama

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend this.  Months of fun.
customer_reviews.text: my 8 year old Granddaughter really liked this. It's is true to the picture on the box. Lots of fun. Started growing in 2 days. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE IRISH

customer_reviews.title: Great project
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter's birthday - she loved it from the minute she saw it. It really is a great project that will take a bit of time to complete; just painting the features in the garden and the container took several days. After that, we planted the seeds and within a week the grass and beanstalks grew like crazy, even indoors and with indirect sunlight. Highly recommended for mostly girls ages 4-7.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Bee

customer_reviews.title: My six year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit, well worth the price. It includes everything you need to build the garden; however we needed to add a bit of extra potting soil. We just mixed it with the dirt mix that was included. We spent several hours together painting each piece, to include the glass stones. She loved deciding where to place the items in the garden and designed a double rock path to the fairy house door. We just planted today, but hopefully we will see growth in the next day or two. Provided that the seeds are good, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. James

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my niece. I haven't heard any complaints and thinks she loves it. She is 6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Seana W.

product_meta.title: Creativity for Kids Enchanted Fairy Garden Craft Kit - Fairy Crafts for Kids
product_meta.description: Style:Enchanted Fairy GardenCraft, plant, water and grow with indoor gardening that engages imagination all year round. Create your own magical miniature fairy land! The Creativity for Kids Wee Enchanted Fairy Garden Craft Kit includes everything you need - just add water! This complete fairy garden kit contains an 11 inch fairy garden dish, flower fairy Hannah figurine, resin fairy house, two resin toadstools, sparkling gems, glittery pixie dust, two tulle butterflies fabric flower bouquet, glass opti-stones, purple gravel, seeds (wheatgrass and bean mixture), potting soil, fine tipped paint brush, six acrylic paints and illustrated instructions with lots of ideas. Great for gifting! This Fairy Garden Terrarium is the perfect unique gift for girls who love fairy crafts. Decorate your own fairy garden with this my first fairy garden craft kit. This Fairy Garden kit is the perfect gardening activity set for children. See your child's creative side come to life as they paint and decorate their fairy garden. Learn about botany and the life cycle of plants as your child watches their fairy garden grow! The Wee Enchanted Fairy Garden kit requires a sunny window to allow your plants to grow. Outdoor use is not recommended. For best results, use a sunny window or the Creativity for Kids Grow Light – sold separately. Contents conform to ASTM D-4236. This fairy garden craft is a great gift or kids craft activity for ages 7 to 97
feature_bullets: GROW A FAIRY WORLD: With a little creative magic, you can grown your very own enchanted fairy garden. This open-ended fairy craft kit lets your child embrace their creative side by making a unique creation that's all their own.

COMPLETE FAIRY GARDEN CRAFT KIT: Everything you need is included - just add water! Kit includes an 11" diameter flower shaped paintable potting dish, enchanted flower house, gemstones, flowers, butterflies, paint, potting mix and seeds that grow like magic

EASY INDOOR GARDENING: Indoor gardening is great for all seasons! Once decorated, place your Enchanted Fairy Garden by a window and watch your plants grow and thrive. Magic Bean and Wheat grass seeds can begin to sprout in as little as 2-4 days.

HAVE FUN WHILE LEARNING: See your child's creative side come to life as they paint and decorate their fairy garden. Learn about botany and the life cycle of plants as your child watches their fairy garden grow!
SAFE FOR KIDS: The Enchanted Fairy Gardening kit includes non-toxic materials and conforms to ASTM D-4236. This craft is a great gift or kids craft activity for ages 7 to 97
